content:
During the night, the enemy attacked the Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovsk region, recorded 3 UAVs and 2 shelling.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

Nikopol and the Chervonohrigoriv community were under the sight. Damaged energy object. College, 2 apartment and one private homes.

In addition, two outbuildings are destroyed, four more damaged. It affected the greenhouse and power lines.

There are no dead and victims.

“Already, all subscribers whose homes were deactivated due to a massive attack on the area were returned. I thank the heroes-energy, ”Sergei Lisak added.

As reported by the Armyinform, tonight mobile fire groups of defense forces, anti -aircraft missile units and air forces aviation31 "Shahed" destroyed.
title: The enemy attacked Nikopol region at night with drones and artillery, there is a destruction
description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak. Under the sight were alone ...
author: Army Inform
